description.displayText: She sounded very nice over the phone and came to my house to meet my family. We agreed on price and I hired her and asked her to start on Monday. The Sunday before, I texted her to confirm that she will be coming on Monday morning and she said yes. On Monday morning we waited, called and texted but nothing! She didn't show up. Instead of saying she wasn't interested anymore she just wasted my time. Don't waste your time with her!
